metadata.title: CVE-2024-48896 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle. It is possible for users with the"send message" capability to view other users' names that they may nototherwise have access to via an error message in Messaging. Note: The namereturned follows the full name format configured on the site.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
